title: # 438 - Donnell Rawlings & ME
description:
Today I sit down with comedian Donnell Rawlings. We talk about shooting “The Cabin”, deleted scenes, what doing stand up at Chappelle’s place is like, joining the Air Force, and much more!  

 

Check out Donnell’s podcast “The Donnell Rawling’s Show” wherever you get yours! 

 

This episode is brought to you by Quip. Go to http://www.getquip.com/bertcast to get your first refill FREE.

 

This episode is also brought to you by Whoop. Go to http://www.Whoop.com and use the Code “Bert” at checkout to save 15%. 

 

This episode is also brought to you by Theragun. Go to http://www.Theragun.com/Bertcast and get your Gen 4 Theragun today.

 

This episode is also brought to you by Miller High Life, The Champagne of Beers. A quality beer within everyone’s reach. Please enjoy responsibly 

 

This episode is also brought to you by Liquid IV. Get 25% off when you go to http://www.liquidiv.com and use the code “Bert” at checkout. 

 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com

Instagram: http://www.Instagram.com/bertkreischer
